definitions.text: a preliminary election where delegates or nominees are chosen
one of the main flight feathers projecting along the outer edge of a bird's wing
(astronomy) a celestial body (especially a star) relative to other objects in orbit around it
coil forming the part of an electrical circuit such that changing current in it induces a current in a neighboring circuit
examples: current through the primary coil induces current in the secondary coil

definitions.text: of first rank or importance or value; direct and immediate rather than secondary
not derived from or reducible to something else; basic

examples: the main doors were of solid glass

definitions.text: of or being the essential or basic part
examples: an elementary need for love and nurturing
